nodes.text: The Asher system was located in the Sprizen sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the terrestrial astronomical object Asher III.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance maintained a cell on Asher III. Shortly before the Battle of Hoth of 3 ABY, the Galactic Empire tracked down the Asher III cell and moved to destroy the Rebel presence there, eliminating most of it. The Rodian arms dealer Lernik De'Yago, who was on the celestial body at the time, stole the Rebel starship Nova Whisper and used it to escape Asher III.
The Asher system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-5.
